page.content: In the area we have{one } {church, Birdhopecraig United Reformed, which serves the immediate area.It was originally called the{Church of {Scotland.}Most people are Presbyterians with some Church of England members, 1 Roman Catholic family and 1 member of the Plymouth Brethren. The United Reformed Church has 49 members with 2 elders,all local people. The church is{linked}with Otterburn where the minister resides. {Services}are every Sunday, alternate mornings at 11.am., afternoons 2.00pm. with a special family service every 3rd Sunday where children read lessons and collect the offerings. Whist drives, concerts and bring & buy sales are held to{raise funds}for the upkeep of the church.
